author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two Standard IV boys were arrested on the charges of causing death of their classmate.

P. Suriya (10) of Kozhikalnatham studying at the Panchayat Union Middle School was beaten by the other two classmates on the school premises in which he suffered injuries. He died at Salem Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital on Saturday. Based on his mother’s complaint, Tiruchengode Rural police earlier registered a case under Sections 341 and 323 of IPC.

After his death, the police altered the Sections to 302 (murder) of IPC and Section 3 (2) (v) of SC/ST Act. Post-mortem was conducted at the Salem GH on Sunday.

Demanding compensation, his parents submitted petition to Namakkal Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy on Sunday. The Collector assured to take necessary action. Later, the parents received the body.

The 9-year-old boys were produced before Juvenile Justice Board and lodged at observatory home in Salem. The police said that a quarrel took place over a geometry box and the two boys beat Suriya.
title: Two schoolboys arrested
